name: Space Game (Elated_Baguette)
description:
Premise: Players are hired to collect lost cargo from the space around them after a large space freighter crashed and spread the cargo as space debris.

Controls: W - Forward S - Backward A - Left Rotation D - Right Rotation Mouseclick - buttons at the bottom.

(Current Issue with the quit button so the game is windowed for now to allow easy restarts)
